title: Hello world
peek: I've finally decided to go ahead and start a blog. Blog is probably pushing it, to be honest. You can think of this as a collective home for all of my ramblings that won't get me canceled.

title: Mabye being bored isn't so bad
peek: when you’re doing nothing a lot more things suddenly become more fun than what you’re doing right now.

title: What I've learnt the first week of programming my "startup"

title: The case for spreading yourself thin
peek: I'm a pretty average individual. I've never been really amazing at anything but I've worked hard to become almost-decent in a few domains and something I've figured out is that the best way to stand-out when you're average is to spread yourself thin. You should be dedicating your time to at least two pursuits even if totally unrelated.
